unnormalised: Hey everyone, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Heard it was a bit dodgy after that Chennai game on 22/07/2024. Also, what about Bumrah's back? Last I checked on 10/07/2024 at 17:00 hrs, it was still troubling him. Hopefully, they'll be fit for the Asia Cup! Fingers crossed! Any news from the NCA or reports citing sources close to BCCI? Need those updates by 25/07/2024 ASAP.
normalised: Hey everyone, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Heard it was a bit dodgy after that Chennai game on twenty second july two thousand and twenty four. Also, what about Bumrah's back? Last I checked on tenth july two thousand and twenty four at five zero zero P M, it was still troubling him. Hopefully, they'll be fit for the Asia Cup! Fingers crossed! Any news from the N C A or reports citing sources close to B C C I? Need those updates by twenty fifth july two thousand and twenty four A S A P.
